item.description:
Join in a group wine tasting at Les Zygomates! 

We've never been, but according to their website, the group wine tasting includes 4-5 wines along with food for $30 (including tax and tip).  The theme for June 7 is Hip, Hip Rose!  Reservations are recommended, so if you RSVP yes, go ahead and call to reserve your spot- 617.542.5108- and then we can meet there (this isn't a private event and there are only a certain number of spots available to the public).  I'll send my number a few days beforehand to those who are going so we can be sure to meet up there.

The website for the wine tasting, with last year's schedule: http://www.winebar.com/wine.html
item.name: Wine Tasting at Les Zygomates
